nodes.text: Circarpous X was a frozen planet in the Circarpous system with a traffic monitoring station.

The tenth planet in the Circarpous system, and was home to a small outpost colony with possible Rebel Alliance sympathizers. There was also a monitoring station there, which interrogated all large traffic moving through the system. Their sensors were geared toward star cruisers and other large ships, but an X-wing or two could slip past.
